actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.
Committee on Finance requested executive comment from OMB, International Trade Commission, Office of the U.S. Trade Representative, Treasury Department, State Department, Commerce Department.

official_title: A bill to amend the Tariff Schedules of the United States to clarify the classification of unfinished gasoline.

summary.text: Amends the Tariff Schedules of the United States to define "motor fuel blending stock" as any product derived primarily from petroleum, shale oil, or natural gas, except naphthas, whether or not containing additives, which is chiefly used for direct blending in the manufacture of motor fuel. Imposes a duty upon such fuel.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Tariff Schedules of the United States to clarify the classification of unfinished gasoline.
